definition.name: actions-template-sync
definition.description: Synchronises changes of the template repository
definition.author: AndreasAugustin

inputs.name: source_gh_token
inputs.description: GitHub Token for the repo to be synced from. Can be passed in using $\{{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

inputs.name: target_gh_token
inputs.description: GitHub Token for the repo to be synced to. Can be passed in using $\{{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

inputs.name: github_token
inputs.description: GitHub Token for the repo to be synced from. Can be passed in using $\{{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

inputs.name: source_repo_path
inputs.description: Repository path of the template

inputs.name: upstream_branch
inputs.description: The target branch

inputs.name: source_repo_ssh_private_key
inputs.description: [optional] private ssh key for the source repository. E.q. useful if using a private template repository.

inputs.name: pr_branch_name_prefix
inputs.description: [optional] the prefix of branches created by this action

inputs.name: pr_title
inputs.description: [optional] the title of PRs opened by this action

inputs.name: pr_body
inputs.description: [optional] the body of PRs opened by this action

inputs.name: pr_labels
inputs.description: [optional] comma separated list of pull request labels

inputs.name: pr_reviewers
inputs.description: [optional] comma separated list of pull request reviewers

inputs.name: pr_commit_msg
inputs.description: [optional] the commit message of the template merge

inputs.name: hostname
inputs.description: [optional] the hostname of the GitHub repository

inputs.name: is_dry_run
inputs.description: [optional] set to true if you do not want to push the changes and not want to create a PR

inputs.name: is_allow_hooks
inputs.description: [optional] set to true if you want to allow hooks. Use this functionality with caution!

inputs.name: hooks
inputs.description: [optional] define the hooks as yaml string input

inputs.name: is_force_push_pr
inputs.description: [optional] set to true if you want to force push and pr update

inputs.name: is_pr_cleanup
inputs.description: [optional] set to true if you want to cleanup older PRs targeting the same branch.

inputs.name: is_keep_branch_on_pr_cleanup
inputs.description: [optional] set to true if you want to keep the branch when pr is cleanup

inputs.name: is_not_source_github
inputs.description: [optional] set to true if the source repository is not a github related repository. Useful e.q. if the source is GitLab

inputs.name: is_force_deletion
inputs.description: [optional] set to true if you want to force delete files which are deleted within the source repository even if they contain changes

inputs.name: is_git_lfs
inputs.description: [optional] set to true if you want to enable git lfs

inputs.name: git_user_name
inputs.description: [optional] set the committer git user.name for the merge commit

inputs.name: git_user_email
inputs.description: [optional] set the committer git user.email for the merge commit

inputs.name: git_remote_pull_params
inputs.description: [optional] set the pull parameters for the remote repository

inputs.name: gpg_private_key
inputs.description: [optional] set the gpg private key if you want to sign your commits

inputs.name: gpg_passphrase
inputs.description: [optional] set if your private gpg key has a password

inputs.name: steps
inputs.description: [optional] set the steps to execute within the action

inputs.name: template_sync_ignore_file_path
inputs.description: [optional] set the path to the ignore file

inputs.name: is_with_tags
inputs.description: [optional] set to true if tags should be synced

outputs.name: pr_branch
outputs.description: The name of the PR branch

outputs.name: template_git_hash
outputs.description: The git hash of the template source repository
